name: Hououmon
description: Phoenixmon is a bird-like Digimon with four wings and blue eyes. Most of its body is covered in golden feathers, with a mane of vibrant, fiery feathers forming a crest that extends down its spine and joins with its flowing tail. It has grey-brown skin and jet black talons. It wears a bronze helmet that covers its face and upper jaw, and Holy Rings around its ankles.
